Package com.informatica.mdm.userexit

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AssignTasksUserExit  
    GetAssignableUsersForTaskUserExit  
    PostLandingUserExit
    The Post Landing user exit is called within the stage process to manipulate data in the landing table before the actual stage process starts.
    PostLoadUserExit
    The PostLoad user exit is used in both the load job and the Put SIF api.
    PostMatchUserExit
    The PostMatch user exit is called as part of the match process.
    PostMergeUserExit
    The PostMerge user exit is called at the end of the merge process for Merge and Multimerge SIF APIs as well as batch automerge.
    PostStageUserExit
    The Post Stage user exit is called as part of the stage process.
    PostUnmergeResponse
    The BO table name and ROWID_OBJECT of the base objects that is reinstated
    PostUnmergeUserExit
    The PostUnmerge user exit is called as part of the unmerge process.
    PreMatchUserExit
    The PreMatch user exit is called as part of the match process.
    PreStageUserExit
    The PreStage user exit is called as part of the stage job before the hub loads the data into the staging table.
    PreUnmergeUserExit
    The PreUnmerge user exit is called as part of the unmerge process.
    PreUserMergeAssigmentUserExit  
    UnmergeKey
    Represents the key which is used for Unmerge API
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PreUserMergeAssigmentUserExitContext  
    UserExitContext
    Represents the hub context that is passed to the user exit interfaces.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DataTypeEnum
    This class contains same data types as used in com.delos.util.database.DataType.java.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UserExitInitException
